name: Dodge the Ball (ariairairi)
description:
Dodge the Ball is a 1v1 dodgeball-inspired game with a wall surrounding the court where you can use it to bounce the ball and do a cool trick shot to hit your opponent.

Controls:

WASD - move

Left click - throw

Right click - catch/pick up

Esc - pause

*Note that catching have to be timed properly

Report bugs to ariairairi@gmail.com with subject: "bug-report:dodge-the-ball"
